menu.name: gameplay
menu.desc: Change gameplay options for VS Impostor

menu.name: double note ghosts
menu.desc: Options for double note ghost trails.

checkbox.name: Character Trails
checkbox.desc: If checked, a ghost will appear everytime you hit more than 1 note at the same time.

number.name: Zoom Multipier
number.desc: Multiplier for how much the camera zooms in when hitting more than 1 note at the same time.

checkbox.name: Camera Movement
checkbox.desc: If checked, the camera will move with the notes' direction.

checkbox.name: Middlescroll
checkbox.desc: If checked, centers the player's strums to the middle.

menu.name: appearance
menu.desc: Change appearance options for VS Impostor

checkbox.name: Flashing Lights
checkbox.desc: If checked, there will be flashing lights in some songs.

checkbox.name: Screen Shake
checkbox.desc: If checked, screen shaking will occur in some songs.

checkbox.name: Window Shake
checkbox.desc: If checked, window shaking will occur in some songs and in some menus.

checkbox.name: Jumpscares
checkbox.desc: If checked, there will be jumpscares in certain songs.

menu.name: ui
menu.desc: Change UI options for VS Impostor

checkbox.name: Psych HUD
checkbox.desc: If checked, the hud ingame will look like psych engine's hud.

number.name: Zoom Multiplier
number.desc: Multiplier for how much the score text zooms when hitting a note.

checkbox.name: Original Icon Lerp
checkbox.desc: If checked, the icons will lerp just like how it does in VS Impostor V4

checkbox.name: Timebar
checkbox.desc: If checked, there will be a timebar based on how much there is left in the song.

checkbox.name: Colored Score Text
checkbox.desc: If checked, the score text will be colored by the opponent's icon color.

menu.name: languages
menu.desc: Change the current game's language. Recommended to not select more than one. Leave all blank for English (USA). (ALPHA)

checkbox.name: UK English
checkbox.desc: Changes the game's language to English (UK).

checkbox.name: Arabic
checkbox.desc: Changes the game's language to Arabic.

checkbox.name: Warning on bootup
checkbox.desc: If checked, a warning will ALWAYS pop up when launching the port. Turn off if it gets annoying.

checkbox.name: Developer Mode
checkbox.desc: If checked, you get access to developer tools and editors. (Look at songs/devStuff.hx in the files for the tools you can use)
